channel.title: Relaying information from one computer to another?
channel.description: Story: my sister's friends are wannabe computer hackers etc. Like, they send things to someones computer, and that computer fucks up. I wanna show them that they're not as good as they think. Is there a way to have a program relay certain actions from one computer (the nerd's computer) to another (mine) ? The purpose being so I can see what the hell they're doing, and turn it around on them.

item.title: Relaying information from one computer to another?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

It’s called VNC fool.

Read full topic
item.source: Relaying information from one computer to another?

item.title: Relaying information from one computer to another?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

If you get free access to the computer you just add it to their folder, or if they are stupid you can just give them a file that do the work for you say it something you think they want.

Add a keylogger and you can log what they are doing (If you get access to their computer you can whitelist the keylogger).

Read full topic
item.source: Relaying information from one computer to another?

item.title: Relaying information from one computer to another?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:6, topic:288587”]Make a .bat file that shutdown the computer and add it into the startup folder.
Hope they know how to start in Safe Mode or they get big problems and you can fix it for them and prove you are better than them.

But what you asked about is that a program that lets you see theirs desktop and control the computer?[/quote]

First part is what I have in mind, using a hidden .bat file, but I don’t know how to make it save to the startup folder

And I’m just picturing a program that relays their actions to me, kinda like logs.

Read full topic

Hope they know how to start in Safe Mode or they get big problems and you can fix it for them and prove you are better than them.

But what you asked about is that a program that lets you see theirs desktop and control the computer?

Just rewrite their hosts file for fun and leave it at that.

You could try nethack - beware of the wizard
